Text: Wikileaks And Julian Assange on India.Good Compilation on one place.

This document appears to be a fraud. The first and last sections have been removed, titled "Indian Muslims unhappy over their leaders' weak response to terror acts: WikiLeaks" and "US feels India has 180m Muslims", respectively, as well as all links to the author's Blogspot. I didn't compare the files for other disinformation. I also didn't verify that my "original sources" are completely original.

The original, previously unseeded until now, torrent is at http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6662069/Wikileaks_on_India_a_Compilation_by_Ashraf_Part-1

Changing text is a strong form of censorship that we need to be aware of.
